meta.title: The Rabbit Hole Tea Bar | Eugene's Best Bubble Tea
meta.description: Eugene's premier bubble tea shop on 17th Ave. Fresh boba, milk teas, fruit teas, and more. Order online for pickup. 8+ years serving Eugene, OR.
meta.keywords: bubble tea Eugene, boba tea Eugene Oregon, milk tea, fruit tea, The Rabbit Hole, 17th Avenue

trust.title: Explore our number-one Bubble Tea picks and favorites.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Experience We Have In this Field

about.title: Brewed with Heart. Served with Joy.
about.paragraph1: We started our bubble tea journey with a simple mission: bring people together over drinks that are full of flavor, fun, and freshness.
about.paragraph2: At our shop, every cup is handcrafted using premium teas, real ingredients, and a whole lot of love. Whether you're craving the creamy richness of a classic milk tea, the zing of fruity infusions, or the chewy perfection of boba.

contact.title: Find or Message Us
contact.subtitle: Something for everyone. Milk teas, fruit teas, toppings & more.

form.title: Send us a message
form.error: There was a problem sending your message.

items.question: What kind of drinks do you serve?
items.answer: We serve a wide variety of bubble tea drinks including classic milk teas, fruit teas, specialty signature drinks, and seasonal favorites. All made with premium ingredients.

items.question: What are your opening hours?
items.answer: We're open Monday to Sunday from 11 AM to 8 PM. Come by any time during those hours for a sip!

items.question: Where are you located?
items.answer: You can find us at 240 E 17th Ave. Eugene, OR 97401. We're conveniently located in the heart of Eugene.

items.question: Can I order online?
items.answer: Yes! We offer online ordering for pickup and delivery. You can place your order through our website or mobile app for a quick and convenient experience.

items.question: Do you have dairy-free alternatives?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer a variety of dairy-free alternatives. Many of our fruit teas are naturally vegan, and we can customize most drinks to meet your dietary preferences.

cta.title: Every Sip is a Celebration of Flavor
cta.subtitle: Come by and discover your new favorite bubble tea today. Eugene's best bubble tea experience is waiting for you!

footer.description: The Rabbit Hole Tea Bar is a Eugene local tea shop. We focus on making delicious and creative bubble tea drinks to serve our neighbors.
footer.newsletter_description: Subscribe to our newsletter to get updates on special offers and new flavors!
